cause.description:
As some of you may be aware, the band has been struggling financially as of late. Some of the alumni, including myself, are brainstorming to raise funds for the band. This is my humble contribution. Quite a few alumni are on Facebook. Even if you can't donate, please join to help get the word out.
1. To raise money for the WJMB
cause.mission: To raise funds for WJMB via Facebook in order to sustain the 80 year old tradition that has been a part of some 5000+ lives.
cause.name: Warren Jr. Military Band
